recipesJson.name: Septet : Strawberry Kiwi & Cream
recipesJson.author: NonStopMix
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is a sweet strawberry and tart kiwi, blended with a light cream.

The strawberry is candyish, juicy, ripe, and syrupy. I used Strawberry Harvest  JF for the main strawberry note. It's a clean candyish strawberry that is similar to Juicy Strawberry FA, but I personally like strawberry harvest more. I boosted the strawberry with Red Touch Strawberry FA.

The kiwi note is candyish and slightly tart. I used Kiwi FW for the candy note, and layered Kiwi FA for its tartness.

I wanted to add some Vanilla since it goes so well with fruits. I decided to use Vanilla Bean Ice Cream by FW, because it's a plain vanilla that does not add alot of weight at this percentage.

I added Whipped Cream by TFA to blend all the flavors together.

To sweeten it up, I added 0.50% of Super Sweet. This is optional. It's pretty sweet without any added sweetener.

####Feedback is welcomed. If you mix up my recipe and review it, in return, I will mix up a recipe of yours and give you an honest review. 

I tested many different variations of flavors and percentages, and I'm finally happy to release this one

This is a shake and vape, but the flavors pop after 2 days. I vape this in various rda's and rta's, and usually mix it at 60-70VG. Enjoy!

*I initially posted this recipe with Red Touch Strawberry FA @ 2% instead of Strawberry TFA.
